author: deeplee
body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] Write a descriptive title.
- [X] Make sure you are able to repro it on the [latest released version](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/releases)
- [X] Search the existing issues.
- [X] Refer to the [FAQ](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/docs/FAQ.md).
- [X] Refer to [Differences between Windows PowerShell 5.1 and PowerShell](https://docs.microsoft.com/powershell/scripting/whats-new/differences-from-windows-powershell).

### Steps to reproduce

NA
not always some times reproduce


error：

130|msmnile_gvmq:/ # echo none   //freeze
[已退出进程，代码为 2148734499]


### Expected behavior

```console
normal run
```


### Actual behavior

```console
freeze a minutes and exit with code  2148734499
```


### Error details

_No response_

### Environment data

```powershell
  $PSVersionTable

Name                           Value
----                           -----
PSVersion                      7.2.0
PSEdition                      Core
GitCommitId                    7.2.0
OS                             Microsoft Windows 10.0.18363
Platform                       Win32NT
PSCompatibleVersions           {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0…}
PSRemotingProtocolVersion      2.3
SerializationVersion           1.1.0.1
WSManStackVersion              3.0
```


### Visuals

_No response_

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: @deeplee can you be more specific about what command/script you ran that triggered the crash?

comments.author: deeplee
comments.body:
> @deeplee can you be more specific about what command/script you ran that triggered the crash?

 I only use “adb shell ” command 
 It always freeze（cannot input and output  anything）  a few minutes and then exit with code 2148734499 when I reproduce

comments.author: deeplee
comments.body: I also reproduce it  on 7.2.1 release

comments.author: knightwolfjk
comments.body:
Minor update: When launching any Terminal in VS Code, the following error text is briefly displayed: 

> SetValueInvocationException: C:\Users\username\Documents\PowerShell\Microsoft.PowerShell_profile.ps1:7:1

Afterward, I get this:

... the very same exit code, 2148734499, when trying to launch the terminal or run any code (or even "Play" an empty file) within VS Code:

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/7070130/201356875-f67cc1ba-26e9-4f38-b815-ec0f8ff155ea.png)

## VS Code version info 

Version: 1.73.1 (system setup)
Commit: 6261075646f055b99068d3688932416f2346dd3b
Date: 2022-11-09T04:27:29.066Z
Electron: 19.0.17
Chromium: 102.0.5005.167
Node.js: 16.14.2
V8: 10.2.154.15-electron.0
OS: Windows_NT x64 10.0.19043
Sandboxed: No

## $PSVersionTable | fl

Name  : PSVersion
Value : 7.3.0

Name  : PSEdition
Value : Core

Name  : GitCommitId
Value : 7.3.0

Name  : OS
Value : Microsoft Windows 10.0.19043

Name  : Platform
Value : Win32NT

Name  : PSCompatibleVersions
Value : {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0…}

Name  : PSRemotingProtocolVersion
Value : 2.3

Name  : SerializationVersion
Value : 1.1.0.1

Name  : WSManStackVersion
Value : 3.0

__troubleshooting continues, I feel like this is more likely to be an environment setup issue than a PS issue__

comments.author: knightwolfjk
comments.body:
**fixed it!**

I deleted _Microsoft.PowerShell_profile.ps1_ from the _C:\Users\username\Documents\PowerShell_ folder, and I'm now able to launch terminals in VS Code without any errors

title: 7.2.0 release exit with code  2148734499
